transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, ji sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Ji, madam.
Executive: Ji, Monica baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir, abhi maine call kiya us time discussion ho rahi thi na but phir baat ho nahi payi. Aapne dekh liya jo maine aapko share kiya hai wo?
Customer: Madam, uske andar aapne apne apne rule dikha rahe ho ki bhai aap mujhe payment wo dikha rahe ho terms. Payment amount dikha rahe ho ki is is tarikh ko. Lekin aapne ye bhi to bola tha do-teen din ke andar mai isko live karwa dungi. Wo abhi tak do-teen din bhi nahi hue.
Executive: Sir, do-teen din ke andar bilkul. Aapne mujhe bataya hi nahi ki pehle TrustSeal ki verification karao phir sare photographs do. Sare bill de diye, sab kuch kar diya, TrustSeal kara diya. Ek second. Already mera MDC, already mera MDC chal raha tha. Pichla bhi chal raha tha, agla bhi chala hai. Phir kyu nahi live kar rahe ho aap?
Executive: Sir, ek second. Kam se kam mujhe live karke ek week to dijiye ki aap pehle hi paise de du. 75% paise de du mai.
Executive: Mai bolu sir?
Executive: Dekho, jo payment term thi wo ye kehti hai ki aaj humne payment kiya to aaj se 30 din baad hume payment karni hogi. Theek hai? To payment terms to ye keh rahi hai. Aap aur party terms kya keh rahi hai?
Customer: Bolne ka mauka to do sir, mai bata rahi hu, wahi samjha rahi hu aapko. To ek to ye payment term ho gayi 30 din aur 60 din. Uske alawa service live karne ki baat karte hai. To aapne hume diya 1,40,000, theek hai, including GST. Aapka MDC ka bhi renewal hona tha aur aapka leading supplier ka bhi renewal hona tha. Dono ka amount hume tagging karni hoti hai. Dono me humne thoda-thoda amount tag kar diya. Theek? Jisse aapki service live ho jati. Aapki MDC band hui nahi, wo as it is aapki live ho gayi. Beech me TrustSeal verification maine bola tha 15 din lagenge minimum se minimum service live hone me, yaad hai? Aapne bola tha Diwali ke baad bhi hoga to chalega.
Customer: Yaad hai sir aapko?
Customer: Abhi TrustSeal to aap ye dekhiye, TrustSeal to meri ho chuki hai.
Executive: Nahi ho chuki na sir, abhi to wo band kar di na abhi. Isiliye band ho gayi kyuki puri payment nahi. TrustSeal ka aapne package to liya nahi tha. TrustSeal chalaya nahi IndiaMART ne. Aapko lead zyada mili na sir? Wo isiliye to mili kyuki aapne. Wo to mera, wo to mera haq tha madam, wo to mera haq tha maine ₹1.5 lakh diya tha mera haq tha wo to TrustSeal.
Executive: Nahi haq tha na sir. TrustSeal to tab live honi chahiye na jab leading supplier aapka live hoga. Leading supplier ke saath complimentary hai, MDC ke saath kabhi complimentary nahi hota TrustSeal.
Customer: To haq to. Abhi kya sir madam aap ye batao right now kya chal raha hai?
Executive: Abhi aapki services block hai, ye sirf aapko hafte ki saat lead mil rahi hai aur kuch bhi nahi mil raha.
Customer: Mera page live bhi nahi hai matlab.
Executive: Nahi, live to chal to raha hai ya lead to mil hi rahi hai na sir inquiry.
Customer: Wo lead kisi kaam ki nahi hoti mai aapko pehle bhi keh chuka hu. Visibility nahi hai matlab mere product, mere uski.
Executive: Haan, abhi to nahi hai visibility, abhi block hai isliye kyuki balance payment. To MDC kyu band kara madam? Maine to MDC se paanch gune paise de rakhe hai. To MDC kyu band kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Mai wahi aapko pehle hi maine bola hai. Maine jab MDC ke paanch gune paise de rakhe hai to aap jo hai use kyu band kar sakte ho? MDC to band hi nahi kar sakte aap. Aap leading supplier band kar sakte ho, MDC kyu band kar rahe ho aap? Leading supplier. Agar misaal ke taur pe ₹1,40,000 ki madam maine ₹1,40,000 ki service li hai. Usme se chalo ₹30,000, ₹35,000 minus kar do ₹28,000 ki jo aapki service hai. To mere ₹1 lakh to phir bhi aapke paas leading supplier ka pada hua hai. Theek hai aap leading supplier jab tak nahi chalu kar rahe ho to kam se kam meri ye to chalu karo.
Executive: Pehli cheez, MDC ki amount ₹32,000 plus GST hai sir, theek hai?
Customer: ₹28 plus GST thi wo.
Executive: Ek, aap sun to lo meri baat suno na. ₹32,000 plus GST ek saal ki thi usme humne discount karke aapko ₹28,000 plus GST pe diya. Ab kyuki ₹1,40,000 hi amount aapne pay kiya tha sir. To kya ₹4 lakh ke bihaf me aapko lakh rupay me hum aapko leading supplier de sakte hai? Nahi de sakte. Humne thoda-thoda amount dono me tag kiya. Humne ₹20,000 MDC me kiya aur baki jo ₹1,20,000 tha wo humne aapka leading supplier me kiya taki dono me wo amount dikhe. At least 50% to dikhega na sir dono me.
Customer: Sir, ye to 50% dikha. MDC aapne chalu kar diya to mera leading supplier kyu nahi kara?
Executive: Aap phir sir maine aapko call pe liya sir Rahul ke saath me. Aapne kya bola mere ko ye product change karwana hai, wo product change karwana hai. Isi chakkar me pura ek mahina to guzar gaya. Maine aapko pehle bola tha sir approval aap de do mai jo bhi kaam hoga wo mai karaungi. Aapne approval hi nahi diya. Aap jab tak approval nahi doge tab tak wo nahi karenge. Ab kal aapka jab email aa gaya service aa gayi to maine aage jab submit kara ki ab isko live karo to live karne me ye aa gaya ki abhi temporary block hai to live nahi ho sakta. Ek aad din ka approval to mai leke live kara dungi sir lekin agar kal maan lo aaj maine ek din ka approval liya. Kal dobara 24 ghante me payment nahi aayi to service band ho jayegi to ab aap mujhe batao kya karna hai?
Executive: Ek din ka mujhe 24 ghante ka approval milta hai. Aap bolo to mai 24 ghante ka approval leke live kara dungi service sir.
Customer: Chalu kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan, leading supplier. Lekin sir phir kal phir block ho jayega agar payment nahi aayi to. Ek hi din ka mujhe time milta hai sir.
Customer: To mera MDC to chalu karo uske to acche paise gaye hue hai aapke paas.
Executive: Wahi to samjhaya. Puri part payment ki deal bani hui hai na sir.
Executive: Mai wahi bata rahi hu 50% waha bhi humne tagging kari hai na sir. Wo puri jab tak MDC. Sir, pehle hi maine aapko bola tha 30 din me payment karni padegi service live ho ya na ho.
Customer: Ye aapne nahi bola.
Executive: Aur ye cheez Sonal sir Sonal mam ne clearly bola tha. Aapne mujhe bola tha aise karo Diwali ke baad isko live kar denge chalega. Maine kaha tabhi bhi live karao sir lekin payment 30 din me hi honi hai. Likh ke bhi isiliye diya hai sir. Ab mujhe yaad hai ki maine aapko date ke saath likh ke mention kiya tha isi din payment karni hai. Accha kuch chhupane wali baat hi nahi hai sir aap itne purane ho hamare saath me. Haan dekho mam date ke saath likha hai sir payable amount for both these services. Aapki leading supplier aap mera band kar do usse to mai ek tarike se kehta hu chalo koi baat nahi MDC kaise band kar sakte ho? Itna paisa diya hua hai aaj mai deal khatam kar lu ki theek hai 28 plus GST lao. Nahi ek minute meri baat suno aaj mai keh du ki ji aap ek kaam karo aapko mujhpe trust nahi ho raha na aap mere 28 plus GST lagao aur mere baki paise wapsi karo. Ye acchi baat hogi?
Customer: Nahi hogi sir bilkul nahi hogi.
Customer: Phir ab aap batao ek insaan ₹1.5 lakh diya baitha hua hai aur usko ek din bhi LS20 nahi mila ek din bhi. Wo wo bechara. Mai keh to rahi hu aapko kara deti hu mai. Maine bola to kara deti hu sir aap agar aisa bolte ho to mai aapko batau mai aapko sachhi batau.
Customer: Mai aapko jo payment kar paunga wo upcoming Monday pe kar paunga mai. Ab aap ek din ka approval kaise? Saat din ka nahi milta sir approval. Maximum. Mai batata hu approval is tarah milega. Kehna ki bhai bechara bechara jo customer hai bada innocent hai aur has to do. Customer bahut innocent hai aur abhi tak uski services live nahi hui thi that's why wo next payment wo tabhi karta to wo ye keh raha hai ki Monday ko upcoming Monday ko aapki payment ho jayegi jab tak ke liye aap uska MDC aur LS20 live karo. Aur agar mai kehta hu theek hai LS20 nahi live kar rahe ek bari ko theek hai to phir aap MDC live karwa do. Baki phir mera LS20 jab se start hoga usi din se 13 mahine gine jayenge koi baat nahi Monday ko jab payment aapko second ho jayegi tab kar dena. Aur bolo kaisa aadmi chahiye aapko? Itna badhiya customer mil gaya.
Executive: Sir ek hi din ka approval mujhe milta hai. Kaise approval hu ye batao aap. Maximum ek din ka mujhe mil sakta hai. Monday tak to meri meri manager bhi nahi kar sakti Sonal mam bhi nahi kar sakti sir. Sonal mam ke upar jayenge wo bhi hume na char baate suna ke bhej denge. Mai bata rahi hu nahi ho payega sir.
Customer: To phir pooch ke batao tum theek hai kya karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai ek din me service mai live kara dungi kal tak aap mujhe bata do ab theek hai. Aap service karaoge to mai 5:00 baje se pehle-pehle bata na because mujhe approval leke aage dalna hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam. Matlab ek din ke liye bhi mujhe approval lena padega. Maine jo aapko baat kahi hai wo baat pahuchao accounts me. Dekhiye aapko koi kuch. Aapko koi kuch kahega nahi. Zyada se zyada aapko no karega aap meri baat pahuchaiye nahi to mai khud pahuchaunga. Nahi to mai khud IndiaMART me customer care pe call karunga mai unse kahunga mujhe accounts team se baat karo meri ye ye matter hai. To khamakha baat badhegi isse behtar hai aap hi le lo aisa renewal. Mai to keh raha hu ki chalo theek hai MDC kar lo yaar. Mujhe pata hai wo no hi hone wala hai. Ek din ka approval milta hai wo maine aapko bol diya. Approval ke liye 5:00 baje se pehle aapko karna padega tabhi mai approval le paungi.
Customer: Chalo theek hai dekhte hai dekhte hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants services to be live.

- MDC is blocked despite paying for it.

- Leading supplier is not activated.



Resolution:

- Explained payment terms and tagging of amounts.

- TrustSeal was closed due to incomplete payment.

- Offered to activate leading supplier for one day.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will inform executive by 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, payment, mdc, trustseal, leading supplier
